data.title: Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur
data.text:
Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur offers a car rental service. Drivers must hold an international driving licence and be at least 23 years old.

In Malaysia, traffic keeps to the left.

Seat belts are compulsory for the driver and all passengers.

Trains

Extensive light rail train services are available on the KTM Komuter, Putra LRT and KL Monorail.

KLIA Express provides uninterrupted train service from the KLIA International Airport to KL Sentral, which is a 20-minute taxi ride from Shangri-La Kuala Lumpur.

Buses

Public buses are widely available within the city at designated public bus stops. Almost all buses are air-conditioned and equipped with an automated ticket vending machine.

A wide range of e-hailing services are available in the city. Please note that a surcharge may apply during high-traffic periods as well as between 12midnight and 6am. Consult our concierge team for further information.
